hero.subtitle: Welcome to DTX
hero.slide1Desc: Experience the Brilliance of Digital Printing on Textiles both on Natural & Synthetic fabrics. Achieve vibrant colors bringing your designs to life.
hero.slide2Desc: We offer a wide selection of high-quality synthetic and natural fabrics to suit your specific needs. Discover the ideal material for your next printing masterpiece.
hero.slide3Desc: Discover our extensive collection of premium fabrics with diverse patterns and colors. From geometric designs to floral prints, find the perfect fabric for your creative projects.
hero.tagline: We transform your ideas into reality with precision and care. Explore the endless possibilities of sublimation printing.

services.designDesc: Supply your own design in appropriate formats or browse our list of ready to print designs.
services.fabricDesc: Supply your own fabric or shop from our wide range of synthetic and natural fabrics.
services.printDesc: We deliver vibrant, long-lasting colors and sharp details that elevate your designs.

about.heading: Bring your ideas to life with DTX
about.intro: DTX is a dedicated fabric printing company specializing in High Quality Digital textile printing on all types of fabrics. With years of experience and a passion for excellence, we transform your designs into masterpieces.
about.lastingBrillianceDesc: Our Global Textile Printing Technology ensures your designs come to life with vibrant, long-lasting colors that maintain their intensity over time.
about.sharpDetailsDesc: We utilize advanced printing techniques to capture every intricate detail of your designs, ensuring sharp lines and flawless reproduction.
about.diverseSelectionDesc: We offer a wide variety of high-quality fabrics to meet your specific needs, ensuring the perfect match for your project and desired outcome.
about.yourVisionDesc: Your satisfaction is our priority. We provide personalized service and expert guidance to bring your unique vision to life.

cta.heading: Your Design. Your Fabric. Best Quality.
cta.body: DTX is a dedicated fabric printing company specializing in High Quality Digital textile printing on all types of fabrics. With years of experience and a passion for precision, we transform your designs into masterpieces.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What types of fabrics do you print on?
faq.a1: We offer sublimation printing on a wide variety of both Natural Fabrics like Cotton, Gabardine & Linen and also Synthetic fabrics including Chiffon, Satin, Voile & Polyester.
faq.q2: What is the minimum order quantity?
faq.a2: Our minimum order quantity varies depending on the specific project requirements. Please contact us for more information.
faq.q3: How long does it take to receive my order?
faq.a3: Turnaround times depend on the size and complexity of your order. We will provide you with an estimated delivery timeframe upon receiving your project details.
faq.a4: Yes, we can provide sample prints so you can evaluate our quality before placing a larger order. Contact us for details.

footer.copyright: Copyright © 2024 DTX Factory. All Rights Reserved.

testimonials.label: Clients Reviews
testimonials.heading: What Our Clients Say About Us

testimonial1.text: Amazing print quality and vibrant colors! DTX brought my designs to life perfectly. Highly recommend their professional team for any high-end textile project.
testimonial1.name: Yomna Ahmed

testimonial2.text: Outstanding service and exceptional quality! The team at DTX understood our vision and delivered beyond expectations. The fabric printing was flawless and the colors were exactly as we requested.
testimonial2.name: Mohamed Ali

testimonial3.text: Working with DTX has been a game-changer for our business. Their attention to detail and commitment to quality is unmatched. We've received countless compliments on our printed fabrics.
testimonial3.name: Sarah Hassan

testimonial4.text: Professional, reliable, and creative! DTX transformed our ideas into beautiful printed fabrics. The turnaround time was impressive and the quality exceeded our expectations.
testimonial4.name: Ahmed Mostafa

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.intro: Our team is ready to assist you with all your fabric printing inquiries. Reach out to us using the contact information below, and we'll be happy to answer your questions and discuss your project requirements.
contact.name: Name
contact.messageSentDesc: Thank you. We have received your inquiry and will get back to you soon.

settings.title: SETTINGS
settings.notice: Changes to your profile apply only to future orders. Existing or in-progress orders keep the information they were placed with.

about.projectsDesc: From small batches to large-scale orders.
about.customerFocusDesc: Your vision and satisfaction drive what we do.
about.historyParagraph: DTX was founded to bring professional digital printing on textiles to businesses and creatives. Our history is built on consistent quality, on-time delivery, and a commitment to turning your designs into lasting products.

patternStudio.title: Pattern Studio
patternStudio.subtitle: Create seamless repeating patterns, preview how they look when tiled, and save them to your library to use in orders.
patternStudio.createDesc: Upload an image to use as a tile. Adjust the tile size to see how it repeats seamlessly.
patternStudio.tileSizeHint: Smaller = tighter repeat · Larger = bigger tiles
patternStudio.uploadToSeePreview: Upload an image to see the repeat preview
patternStudio.myLibraryDesc: Your saved patterns. Use any in the shop when placing an order.
patternStudio.noDesignsYet: No designs yet. Create and save a pattern above.
patternStudio.confirmDelete: Remove this design from your library?
patternStudio.loginRequired: Sign in to create and save patterns.
